description: Explore a comprehensive report on global EdTech investments and delve into the intersection of blockchain technology and education. Discover insights from HolonIQ, Coinbase Ventures, Ripple's Xpring, as well as blockchain research from prestigious institutions like MIT and Stanford.
keywords: EdTech, blockchain, investments, HolonIQ, Coinbase Ventures, Ripple Xpring, MIT blockchain research, Stanford blockchain research, education technology, financial technology
title: HolonIQ Report on Global EdTech Investments
